Title: SWPEditor: A Simple Word Processor
Description:
It allows paging, printing and text formatting (bold, underline, italics, font size, space between lines and paragraphs, font color and selection, cut, copy and paste).
It includes a windows forms control, and a simple user interface using that control.  It is written in .NET.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
It allows paging, printing and text formatting (bold, underline, italics, font size, space between lines and paragraphs, font color and selection, cut, copy and paste).
It includes a windows forms control, and a simple user interface using that control. It is written in .NET.

Project Brief

The project is composed by the following binaries:

SWPEditor is the project that generates the text editor executable.
SWPEditorControl contains the Windows Forms Control, and a Form that can be used as a user interface.
SWPEditorBase has the base functionality (it is written in spanish, but it can be translated to english in the future).

The project is alpha. Suggestions will be appreciated.
